website_summaries.verdict: This is a good option if you don't have any floor or wall space for a freestanding or wall rack.
pros: Holds fishing rods of all shapes and sizes
Made of heavy-duty steel that won't wear out or get affected by sun or salt
Keeps rods organized and out of the way without taking up floor space
cons: No directions for the installation, but it is pretty straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Great, Simple, Strong and Functional
customer_reviews.text: A simple and perfect solution. I initially bought two of these to see if they would fit my plans. They looked like just what the doctor ordered so I ultimately bought a total of eight. I hung them up over the garage door so they would be out of the way. I couldn't be happier with the arrangement, the convenience and advantage of getting my fishing rods off the floor and neatly sorted. I would definitely recommend these for anyone having similar plans or needs. See photos attached.
customer_reviews.author: Straight_Talk

customer_reviews.title: Rungs spaced too closely for spinning reels
customer_reviews.text: Simple and utilitarian...does the job. I have 2 gripes: 1. I use only spinning rods so the reel hangs down further. Each level of this rack needs to be at least another inch apart to keep reels from resting on the reel or rod below it. If you use primarily bait casters this rack would work well for you. 2. The package came with no screws and 3 wall anchors. I assume that the unsealed plastic bag that was supposed to hold the hardware came open at some point and they fell out. No biggie, I had some old screws in my toolbox and the task isn't going to hold a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H

customer_reviews.title: I 10/10 DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Probably the cheapest, most terrible product I could have ever wasted my money on, the screws and anchors sent with the rack were completely worthless, and on top of that the holes to mount the rack were not even correct on the rack they were angled and would not even sit Flush on my ceiling, hands down would not recommend you to waste your time just to get a terrible product with such low quality of craftsmanship and the coating around the rack is to only cover up the poor quality work. The rack is far from sturdy. Like I said, don’t waste your time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Snuggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage rack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an out of the way storage rack for my numerous rod and reels and run across this unit. It needs no assembly and is easy to install. I install the unit in the overhead of and outdoor lean to. Rod and reels are now totally protected and easily accessible. Very nice unit.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Useful and simple enough
customer_reviews.text: This rack works well for 6 to 8 rods with reels, but not as well for 12 as advertised. If you have fairly long rods and large reels for saltwater, as I do, they're so closely spaced that they get in each other's way. That's especially true if you keep them rigged and ready. The rack is worth the money, though, especially if your rods are now piled in a corner or hung from random hooks and nails as mine were.
customer_reviews.author: subverb

customer_reviews.title: Hang 'em High!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect storage solution for these boomers who significantly downsized. Very impressed with construction and ease of installation. Got the rods out of small storage closet and safely stowed overhead. Easy access yet safe from pets and small people who find spinny twirly things interesting. So happy with this that we have encouraged real fishermen to purchase. Great product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Annaryp

customer_reviews.title: Makes sliced bread Luddite...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot understand why I did not invest in these YEARS ago. Mounted two racks to the garage ceiling directly above the boat. Really simple to select rods on the way out and replace them when back at home. If you have more than a couple of rods, you REALLY need to get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Was able to use the wasted space on the ceiling above where my garage door opens and the fishing poles are put away so they aren’t damaged. And I didn’t worry about screwing it into a stud (used screw anchors tho) because it’s not heavy and neither are the fishing poles!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Honestly better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This overhanging rod holder is great. I got it to store my rods in the shed. I wanted to have my two piece rods on one side and as a result some of the reels touch one another. I could alternate the larger two piece rods but I think how I did it looks better. I would recommend this product. It was easy to install. The material seems decent. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great rod rack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rack for the price. Came with all hardware to install (super easy). It's incredibly easy to get the rods in and out of the rack without bumping the guides or getting them all tangled up together. Sometimes the simplest designs are the best. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Good rod holder for the weekend fisherman
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product. It holds the rods nicely and not too cramped as long as your not holding huge big lake or ocean fishing reels. I have a couple big lake rods, a fly and some small panfish rods. The holder is sturdy and the hardware isn't junk. When I have more rods than space I'll buy another.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS W

customer_reviews.title: Get those poles organized!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. There should be NO negative reviews of this product. I have some 6.5' rods all the way through 12 foot rods. All of them are held securely with, or without reels on this rack. Easy to install, just make sure you use the washers that come with it. I have an overhead loft in my garage that is build with metal studs, I pre-drilled holes and used the screws/washers that were supplied. The rack is very secure, and all rods are easy to get in and out. Quality, affordable, good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for freeing up wall space. This ceiling mounted rod holder is a simple and sturdy design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This rack and the screws that it comes with are way too flimsy to hold 1, let alone 12, fishing rods. We used the molly bolts that came with the screws, and it still didn't help. The screws don't secure the rod to the wall, and as soon as we hung 1 rod to test it the entire thing started to bend down under the weight. Just don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Kistler

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to fish to say the least. He had the fishing rods against the wall and I would always be worried for them to fall and break. This rack is a breeze to assemble and who doesn’t like things off the ground. This is a simple design but perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Usefull
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and includes dry wall anchors if you don't have studs in a good spot. It will hold all 12 rods like it states, but that's really if they are all fresh water rods, any of my bigger saltwater rods will fit but after 4 in a row(even alternated) they are all kind of pinned in there. I wish there was just another half inch of spacing would make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product it was easy to install and holds all my rods great
customer_reviews.author: Leddie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to imstall
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. Really freed up a lot of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: FZ1Driver

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but does a great job organizing my fishing equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy but does a great job getting my poles out of the shed and organized. Included all the hardware I needed to mount on the wall. We've already received compliments from others on how well it works and looks.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great rack for storing multiple rods conveniently.  Can handle heavy duty deep sea fishing rods with oversized reels.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I took up fishing two years ago. Now we have 12 rods! Can't believe how many we accumulated so quickly. Some are for lake fishing for trout, others are for pier fishing in the ocean and a few are for when we go deep sea fishing. The rods were a mess until I bought this. Now they are all neatly organized, out of the way, but easy to access. I highly recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal CL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit above the garage door. Up and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Great rack, minus the fact that your spin cast reels will over lap if you have more than one...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, so we could get our garage a bit more organized. It works well, and I think it looks great! It was very easy to install. His only complaint is that there's not enough space between the hooks to place a spin cast reel on each one without it hitting the pole below it. That's why, if you notice on the picture, there's only a spin cast reel on the bottom. Other than that it functions well!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: this is the best pole rack
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is the best pole rack!! I now have 6 poles hanging where they belong......out of the way of everything. I like the ceiling mount, which just might be the next one I get. Don't listen to other post regarding "flimsy". Unless you are hanging whale poles, this mount is absolutely strong enough to handle your 6 fishing poles, unless you leave the 4# weights on them!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Busmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Just what my rods needed
customer_reviews.text: That's a much better way to store rods. Mine are always a tangled mess but this should keep everything neat and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Really, really good rack. I store my rods in my garage overhead, and this is the only rack I have found that holds them. Nice, sturdy steel construction. There are two pieces that come in the set. I purchased two sets and use three of the four pieces, that way it holds all my different rod lengths, with reels attached, at the same time. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly . . . measure first!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this set and they work perfectly. He wasn't sure if the padded grips would fit through the openings, but they do with a little room to spare. He has rods of several different lengths and had to spend a lot of time setting them up and organizing them on the ground before hanging the rack. They fit great in the space we have for them and are totally out of the way! Ordering another set soon!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie B Coddington

customer_reviews.title: Organize your rods and keep them out of harms way.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought three sets of these and couldn't be more satisfied. Keep your rods (with reels) organized and up and out of harms way.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. It got my rods up off the floor ...
customer_reviews.text: somewhat cheap wire product. But it does exactly what its supposed to do. This is the kind of product where design is more important than actual build quality. Plastic coated wire will last for years. Its well laid out and its cheap enough so you can buy 2 or 3 without it breaking the bank. Perfect. It got my rods up off the floor and looks pretty good doing it. (since everyone is looking at the rods)
customer_reviews.author: D. Mei

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my toys off the floor!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my garage, keeps my rods easily accessible, but out of the way. Very easy to install. Probably going to buy again, as my rod collection keeps growing (huh, huh)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Rex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the garage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the garage. I love that you can space them how you want. Remember, you get what you pay for. -Kyle
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby for Christmas and he loves it. Got the fishing poles out of a corner in the garage and mounted to the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: We wish we’d organized our garage sooner. We love this rack for our fishing poles. Money well spent. Easy to install. We used a stud finder to locate the studs in the ceiling. We did have to bend one of the racks to make it straight but no big deal. Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Welds broke as soon as weight was put on the track I do not recommend for anything heavier then freshwater gear
customer_reviews.author: leon r.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to store fishing rods. They are out of the way, and protected from getting banged up leaning in a corner or under the bed. They are easy to see, so you can get the one you want without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: N Y

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for all the fishing poles my husband has. Needed to get them off the floor before they got damaged. Was able to install both in 10 minutes myself. Looks good and great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend and his multitude of poles .. Gets all of his seasonal rods out of the way of his day to day stuff; and also keeps them away from the kids. He LOVES it! Very strong. He did need to wash it before installing due to oil that was added for manufacturing or shipping but other then that works great
customer_reviews.author: Angie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely stores fishing rods out of the way
customer_reviews.text: Work great. I'd give 5 starts but one of them leans. Doesn't affect it's use but it bugs me when I look at it from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Good product for hanging fishing rods.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. The large butt end holder is just big enough to hold typical boat rods. My wish was that the hooks were farther apart (maybe an inch) for the large reels not bang and snare each other.
customer_reviews.author: The Philadelphia Flyers Rule!

customer_reviews.title: good rack. you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: installed easy enough, construction seemed just fine, had all the hardware. not much else to say about it, just a good, cost effective way to keep your rods up and out of the way. rubberized plasti-dip type coating over the metal means it won't likely scratch your rods or snag your line or anything
customer_reviews.author: Ragel

customer_reviews.title: Great rack, but why not make it better!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, would love to see these sorts of racks, and other things designed for mounting to have mounting points on standard intervals...12”,16”,24”....sure would make install easier and more robust!
customer_reviews.author: ZC

customer_reviews.title: Solid rack to hold yer rod
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my boathouse ceiling. Make sure you orient it with the large hook opposite a small hook. Very easy to install. Would buy again. I have inland fishing rods in it and they fit no problem. Sometimes line snags on rack when pulling down a rod but just pay attention to what you're doing! I dont see anything keeping me from getting 12 poles in it once i own that many!
customer_reviews.author: Bigdaddy65

customer_reviews.title: Solid!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So simple and so effective!! Have 2 sets of these up in garage ceiling. Rods are sage and secure. Need a rod..simply reach up and take it down. Only problem is I had 2 open spaces and it didn't look right. So .... I bought 2 more rods!!
customer_reviews.author: Brush WolfTop Contributor: Snowboarding

customer_reviews.title: Great for ceiling storage
customer_reviews.text: Installed with no problem on ceiling and stored rods easily. Appears well made but simple.
customer_reviews.author: Lakecottage

customer_reviews.title: and have no problem comfortably fitting open face river and lots of big salt ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for storing lots of river, and salt rod and reels overhead in my garage. Alternate direction of rod/reel, and have no problem comfortably fitting open face river and lots of big salt rod/reel combos.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This are mounted on the ceiling of my front porch - with my pond just steps away - - keeps the clutter of fishing rods off the porch - but yet readily accessible
customer_reviews.author: NC10735285

customer_reviews.title: Easy and perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: All the rods are upon the ceiling, no lost floor space. Super easy and so, so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had a need to store my fishing gear, fortunately I found these. Trust me you will love them.
customer_reviews.author: James R Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Could be configured a little better , works good though
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: We mounted this in the garage for my husband and son's rods. It is a great way to keep the rods out of the way and keeps them from getting tangled up.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution
customer_reviews.text: Works for me 😊! Poles are safe, visible and out of the way. They have their own place/space. I should have done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Xtina

customer_reviews.title: Very basic and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great rack easy to install was able to save space.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great have 3 sets of these and will be buying a 4th soon as the 3 are almost full
customer_reviews.author: Jw

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for hanging rods in the garage. Easy to install. Just need to make sure the large and small hooks are opposite when you hang the second one. Can be a little tricky making sure reels don't hang up on adjacent rods. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: GaryK11

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! keeps my gear out of the way in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! keeps my gear out of the way in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I have been looking for. Rods and reels have been stored in the corner, always get tangled and knocked around. This gets them off the floor, and in a protected area, and out of the way. Easy to install, took about ten minutes, mostly to find the studs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rack..
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack to keep my rods organized and safe on the wall. It looks like good quality and brings all the required hardware to mount it on a wall. My wife is also happy that my rods are not wandering around anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JLEMUS

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift and it works great, my boyfriend uses it in the garage to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and it works great, my boyfriend uses it in the garage to keep the poles out of the way and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is not exactly what I thought it was it is just too straight line hooks that you met on your wall but it does the job and it is what they said it was... wished it came with three of them so that it would have support in the middle but put them close together when you mouth them its okay.. great value
customer_reviews.author: Kim DunkapTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Happy fisherman
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He installed in no time and was thrilled at the ease and equally thrilled to get his cherished surf poles hung safely.
customer_reviews.author: Domsgram

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and easy to install. I have one set for inshore rods and another set for offshore rods. I put 6 offshore rods with 30 size reels on them, I don't think you will get many more than that on there, it's pretty tight with 6. Definitely Christmas gifts this year for the boys.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Important to have
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We hung it on the ceiling of the garage. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stud finder and a drill to install in the ceiling of my garage. Alternating direction of storage, comfortably stored seven rods, four with reels
customer_reviews.author: Sawdust66

customer_reviews.title: ... very difficult to send this junk back what a waste of time money and effort to buy something you ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk junk it was broken when I got it and as we all know it is very difficult to send this junk back what a waste of time money and effort to buy something you have to spend all your time sending back shame on you
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: needs a light bungee cord.
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well in my RV. Now my expensive rods and reals have an out of the way place where they are safe during travel and while using the RV. Its your basic metal rack but has a nice coating to protect your rods. make sure you put a reel on each rod or lightly strap a bungee cord to keep rods from moving around too much during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Fishing Rod Holder!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and easy to install. I purchased two and mounted them on the wall of a storage building to keep our rods and reels out of the way to prevent accidental damage to expensive fishing equipment. They have worked so well I plan to buy two more in the near future. I highly recommend this product and the great service I receive when I buy from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dantanelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Installed in the ceiling of my garage to use space above the door whe it is open. Only have 5 rods on it so fare but it looks great and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Parag Shah

customer_reviews.title: and you can fit basically any rod and reel combo on this awesome piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for for our small apartment. Allows me to keep all of my rods out of the way, and neatly organized. Remember to measure properly, and you can fit basically any rod and reel combo on this awesome piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them safe
customer_reviews.text: It mounted easily and holds my fishing poles nicely. It keeps them out of the way and protected. Don't have to worry about the tips being broken.
customer_reviews.author: John Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Simple, but very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to store some older rods out of the way. Easy to install in my application, and well designed. Be sure to pay attention to the orientation of the hooks when you install these racks.
customer_reviews.author: albacorky

customer_reviews.title: Love this pole holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this pole holder! The ceiling was the last option for my garage and I'm just tall enough to pit them up without a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Frudden

customer_reviews.title: Great for garage
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 mounted above my garage door. I have just enough room above my open garage door to hang them. Great use for a space that is normally unused.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Holds Poles
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, you will have to hang your rods like they are pictured or the reels will get in the way of the pole below them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fishing rod rack.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of fishing rod holders and finally ended up ordering this one. It works perfectly for storing all our rods in an out of the way place. I like the fact that you can leave the reels on the rods, hand them up and keep them not only out of the way, but free from damage. Much better than standing them in a corner in the garage or shed. Very glad I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Product is awesome. It mounted perfectly under my overhead storage in my garage and holds all my rods just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect overhead rod storage!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and holds all ours rods with ease. Buying another!
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing your fishing poles used a side rod ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing your fishing poles used a side rod holder in the front so able to store twice the poles
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: hung it on the garage ceiling and put my best reels and rods up there
customer_reviews.text: hung it on the garage ceiling and put my best reels and rods up there... works great and keeps them safer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep rods high and out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Installed today, great for keeping your poles safe and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband had one already needed to get another one to keep his reels in order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does what it has to
customer_reviews.text: The welds that hold the rod hooks are cheap and flimsy. One of the hooks has already fallen off with very minimal use. Not the best one out there, but not that expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: M. M

customer_reviews.title: 1.5" from brilliance
customer_reviews.text: The only flaw in this product is that the hook spacing is too narrow for most spinning reels to hang without interfering with the rods below them ... even when rods are hung with reels on alternating sides of the rack, as in the product photo. If the spacing between the hooks were increased by about 1.5" , this would be a essentially perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: J3

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent and strong. We love this ceiling mount - his poles are finally safe from damage up there! YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Karen N

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for mounting to the ceiling of my garage. I've got some 8ft and 6ft rods. Was even able to fit two smaller rods on the same hooks. I've got 14 rods currently hanging on it. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Storage for rod and reels
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my husband. I wanted a place to store these rod and reels where the grandkids could not get stuck with hooks. This is ideal! I've already had positive comments from family members
customer_reviews.author: Dianne W

customer_reviews.title: Holds all of my fishing poles up on the ceiling ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my fishing poles up on the ceiling and out of the way. Space saver and fishing lines no longer tangle with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Wgrod1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod holder. Enables me to hang both fly and spinning rods (and reels) out of the way, and safe from damage.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you thrilled we are with this purchase! Product is one of our best buys on Amazon.com ever! Bought a second one after installing the first!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES it! Easy install and doesn’t hang too low.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great - simple yet perfect for my application
customer_reviews.author: Ken Smith

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Living in a loft, I wanted my rods up for the winter but looking nice in the nitch of things. I ordered this thinking it would be utilitarian. It is much nicer on the wall than it seemed in the photos. Higher quality in finish too. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: raye-raye

customer_reviews.title: Fishing rod holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this it put my fishing rods out the way but in a safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Yogee

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Non marring rubber covered steel with installation ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Non marring rubber covered steel with installation hardware. Nothing more to buy. To the guy that wished the opposite hooks were an alternate size, un screw it rotate it 180 degrees and put it back. Your all set. :) That's how I installed mine. Big hook lines up with small hook.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jost

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Storage is always premium & a overhead rack is a good solution. This rack is metal, not plastic, & the rods, with or without reels, lift on & off easily, without tangling. I'd recommend this rack to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hall

customer_reviews.title: nice addition to the garage storage
customer_reviews.text: These work great to hold the rods above the boat in the garage! This is the third one I have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: sportsmom

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy. Two of the hooks fell off while ...
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. Two of the hooks fell off while I was installing it. The hooks are apparently welded to the uprights, and the least bump or pressure makes them fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing rod holder, saves space and reduce clutter
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing rod holder. There was no instruction with this, but if you can’t install simple things like this, you probably not a good fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great rack at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great rack at a great price. Shipping was prompt. If you are a saltwater fisherman, it's tough to get 12 poles with conventional reels on there. Defiantly would recommend this rack to anyone who is being pestered by their significant other that they have their poles laying around!
customer_reviews.author: kataalo

customer_reviews.title: its ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: i put mine in the garage and it's perfect there. the hangers arent all welded tough. 1 was loose and broke off easily. i put it back with a metal glue. in fact i put metal glue on all of them just to make sure my rods will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: CaLoy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but it can bend easily while installing
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but it can bend easily while installing. Although it is easy to try and bend back, it can make it difficult to make it sit flat on the wall and may not look as good as other rod holders. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mike Capozziello

product_meta.title: Rack'em Overhead Fishing Rod Rack
feature_bullets: Organize your rod collection - protect from damage & increase accessibility
For Indoor / Outdoor Use - not affected by sun or salt
Mount in garage, basement, boat, boat house, camp or cabin
Holds all fishing rod shapes, sizes & styles
Heavy-duty steel construction, 28"L x Adjustable Width x 4"H
